ComicInfo.Title: Bring Me The Head Of Mickey Dobbs
ComicInfo.Summary: "BRING ME THE HEAD OF MICKEY DOBBS" Everyone's favorite Merc with a Mouth hacks and wisecracks his way across the Marvel Universe in this third on-going monthly series featuring a new guest-star every month! This month: the Zapata Brothers, brought to you by the creative team behind DEADPOOL: SUICIDE KINGS, Mike Benson and Carlo Barberi! What happens when you take the Regenerarting Degenerate, a couple of Mexican wrestler bounty hunters, the South American drug cartel, and a one-million dollar bounty on the head of a guy who's already dead? You get a ride into the bowels of a Texas border town, where everyone is out for themselves...and nothing is as it seems.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:45:06. [CVDB185975]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Jody LeHeup, Joe Quesada
